Name: Rhodes
Description: The largest island in the Dodecanese, famous for its medieval architecture and ancient ruins.

Name: Kos
Description: An island known for its sandy beaches, ancient ruins, and the birthplace of Hippocrates.

Name: Santorini
Description: A famous volcanic island known for its stunning sunsets, whitewashed buildings, and crystal-clear waters.

Name: Mykonos
Description: A popular island known for its vibrant nightlife, luxurious resorts, and beautiful beaches.

Name: Naxos
Description: The largest island in the Cyclades, known for its rich history, ancient temples, and agricultural products.

Name: Paros
Description: An island known for its picturesque villages, beautiful beaches, and marble production.

Name: Ios
Description: An island famous for its party atmosphere, stunning beaches, and ancient ruins.
